LanguageData.MCS.materialsok: Needed materials have been transferred to the damaged spaceship. You can now begin repairs.
LanguageData.MCS.nomaterials: Not enough materials to perform repairs. Ensure the materials are stockpiled near the spaceship.
LanguageData.MCS.shiptakingoff: A MiningCo. spaceship is taking off.
LanguageData.MCS.landingpadpayment: A dispatcher spaceship paid you {0} silver for using your landing pad.
LanguageData.MCS.boardmedicnosilver: Board medical spaceship ({0} silver) (not enough silver)
LanguageData.MCS.cannotboardmedic: {0} cannot board MiningCo. medical spaceship.. There is no more any free slot.
LanguageData.MCS.cannotboardmedicsilver: {0} cannot board MiningCo. medical spaceship.. You have not enough silver to pay for {1} orbital healing.
LanguageData.MCS.startrepairsTT: Click to transfer repair materials to the spaceship. Make sure the materials are stockpiled near the spaceship. Your colonists will then be able to repair the spaceship.
LanguageData.MCS.whatdoyouwant: "MiningCo. here! What do you want, partner?"
LanguageData.MCS.requestapproved:
"Alright, a supply ship should arrive soon with our best stuff. Greetings partner!"
-- End of transmission --
LanguageData.MCS.medicrequestapproved:
"We are sending you a medical ship immediately.
Hold on down there, we're coming!
-- End of transmission --
LanguageData.MCS.airsupportrequestapproved: "Your air support request has been approved by my hierarchy. What kind of strike should we launch?"
LanguageData.MCS.noairsupport:
"We cannot send you the requested air support. Damn those pirates, our ammo stock is too low to help you right now. I hope you will find a solution on your own!
Greetings partner!"
-- End of transmission --
LanguageData.MCS.requesttakeoffTT: Request ship take-off. Note: solar flare and other events may delay actual take-off.
LanguageData.MCS.notenoughsilver: not enough silver near orbital trade beacon
LanguageData.MCS.employeelost: A MiningCo. employee has been injured or killed in your area. MiningCo. goodwill toward you decreased: {0}
LanguageData.MCS.partnershipfeeTT: To establish a regular trading route or resolve a dispute with MiningCo., you must pay a "partnership fee". Use the orbital relay console to proceed.
LanguageData.MCS.ancillaryTT: Spaceships may only land there if primary landing pad is busy. Click to set it as primary.
LanguageData.MCS.primaryTT: Spaceships will land there in priority if landing pad is clear. Otherwise, they will choose another.
LanguageData.MCS.enablelightsTT: Disable the beacon lights if your are getting a performance hit with dynamic glowers. Switching the landing pad power off and on may be necessary.
LanguageData.MCS.onepermap: You can only build one {0} per map.
LanguageData.MCS.cargoshiplanding: A MiningCo. cargo spaceship is landing.
LanguageData.MCS.medicshiplanding: A MiningCo. medical spaceship is landing.
LanguageData.MCS.dispatchdrop: A MiningCo. dispatcher is dropping an expedition team.
LanguageData.MCS.setnewtargetTT: Designate a new airstrike target. This can delay the next run as the strike ship has to change its planned trajectory. Can only designate an unfogged position.
